campaign_bonus_value_ids_religion.notes: Adds to religious conversion factors for regions. Used at region and faction bonuses (split to allow more detailed source demarcation in UI, ie we show factional effects separately)
Adds to religious conversion factors, used at either region or province or faction scope.

Adds to religious conversion factors for regions, but only when the parameter religion matches the region-owner's state religion. Used at region and faction bonuses (split to allow more detailed source demarcation in UI, ie we show factional effects separately)
Affects diplomatic relations. Used at faction bonuses.
Affects diplomatic relations. Used at ancillary bonuses.
Affects diplomatic relations. Used at building bonuses.
Affects diplomatic relations. Used at imperium bonuses.
Affects diplomatic relations. Used at technology bonuses.
Add public order for religion. Used at faction province bonuses. Works in the same way as public order, except it will show up as "faction" in the public order breakdown.
Adds to osmotic religious conversion factors for regions. Used at region bonuses
Adds to osmotic religious conversion factors for regions, but only when the parameter religion matches the source region-owner's state religion. Used at region bonuses
Add public order for religion. Used at faction province bonuses. Used in faction province public order, where X% of province is culture Y, apply X% of Y's bonus value.
